2017-04-29.abstract: Can my landlord evict me for having a dog while advertising newly renovated apartments in the building as pet-friendly?
2017-04-29.snippet: Can my landlord evict me for having a dog while advertising newly renovated apartments in the building as pet-friendly?
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: Q. For a decade, my pet Chihuahua has lived with me in my rent-stabilized apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn. In January, the building’s new owners began eviction proceedings against me, on the grounds that owning a pet violated my lease. But I’ve noticed that listings for newly renovated units advertise the building as pet-friendly. I suspect the eviction suit is harassment (I’m head of the tenants’ association). Does my landlord have grounds to evict me, and can he have different rules for different tenants?
2017-04-29.headline_main: A Selective ‘No Pets’ Policy

2017-04-29.abstract: The protests were initiated by the Open Russia organization founded by Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, an exiled former oil tycoon.
2017-04-29.snippet: The protests were initiated by the Open Russia organization founded by Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, an exiled former oil tycoon.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — Thousands of Russians lined up in cities across their country on Saturday to present letters of protest at government offices, the second widespread show of public discontent in two months.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Thousands of Russians Present Letters of Protest in Demonstrations

2017-04-29.abstract: Johnson, a 16-year veteran, has unexpectedly become a key for the offense off the Utah bench in the playoffs, especially with the game on the line.
2017-04-29.snippet: Johnson, a 16-year veteran, has unexpectedly become a key for the offense off the Utah bench in the playoffs, especially with the game on the line.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: There have been several incarnations of Joe Johnson over the years. He was a top-10 pick who did not quite fit in Boston, which led to a trade to Phoenix, where he found his calling as Steve Nash’s favorite gunner. Johnson was an obscenely expensive, yet underappreciated, All-Star in Atlanta. He was also a solid, but somewhat disappointing, cog on a superteam in Brooklyn that ended up being far from super.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Joe Johnson, a Taciturn Veteran, Speaks Volumes for the Jazz

2017-04-29.abstract: Nearly 300 executives have visited this year, putting C.E.O.s on par with senior lawmakers as influences on President Trump’s thinking.
2017-04-29.snippet: Nearly 300 executives have visited this year, putting C.E.O.s on par with senior lawmakers as influences on President Trump’s thinking.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — In a meeting at the White House with business leaders two weeks into his presidency, Donald J. Trump turned to Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Persuasive Business Leaders Parade Through White House

2017-04-29.abstract: Ms. Le Pen said she had reached an agreement with Nicolas Dupont-Aignan, a right-wing politician who shares her distrust of the European Union.
2017-04-29.snippet: Ms. Le Pen said she had reached an agreement with Nicolas Dupont-Aignan, a right-wing politician who shares her distrust of the European Union.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: PARIS — Marine Le Pen, the far-right French presidential candidate, said on Saturday that she would name a former rival and fellow Euroskeptic as her prime minister if elected, in a new effort to broaden her appeal and defeat her centrist opponent, Emmanuel Macron, in the second round of the country’s elections on May 7.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Marine Le Pen Will Name a Former Rival Prime Minister if Elected

2017-04-29.abstract: Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon train us to solve.
2017-04-29.snippet: Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon train us to solve.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: VARIETY PUZZLE — In another lifetime, I was a canine behaviorist and I helped people understand their dogs’ behavior so the dogs and their humans could live peacefully together.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Variety Puzzle: Acrostic

2017-04-29.abstract: As Washington evaluates the first 100 days of Mr. Trump tenure, the one consensus is that, for better or worse, the capital has headed deep into uncharted territory.
2017-04-29.snippet: As Washington evaluates the first 100 days of Mr. Trump tenure, the one consensus is that, for better or worse, the capital has headed deep into uncharted territory.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — In his first 100 days in power, President Trump has transformed the nation’s highest office in ways both profound and mundane, pushing traditional boundaries, ignoring longstanding protocol and discarding historical precedents as he reshapes the White House in his own image.
2017-04-29.headline_main: How Trump Has Reshaped the Presidency, and How It’s Changed Him, Too

2017-04-29.abstract: Thames, who entering Friday led the majors in home runs, rejuvenated his career by deciding at age 27 to play in the Korean Baseball Organization.
2017-04-29.snippet: Thames, who entering Friday led the majors in home runs, rejuvenated his career by deciding at age 27 to play in the Korean Baseball Organization.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: You never really know when a FaceTime chat will change your life. For Eric Thames, the majors’ early-season slugging sensation, it happened in late 2013, when he was playing for a team in Caracas, Venezuela.
2017-04-29.headline_main: For Brewers’ Eric Thames, Stint in South Korea Goes a Long Way

2017-04-29.abstract: New screening measures for a program that promises an expedited track to citizenship for immigrants who enlist have taken far longer than anticipated.
2017-04-29.snippet: New screening measures for a program that promises an expedited track to citizenship for immigrants who enlist have taken far longer than anticipated.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: MIAMI — Thousands of immigrants who joined the United States military with promises of a fast track to citizenship are stuck in limbo as new screening measures have taken far longer than expected, leaving some military members around the nation unable to become citizens or even go to basic training.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Vetting Delays Snarl Path to Citizenship for Thousands in Military

2017-04-29.abstract: While his actions have produced few of the policy changes he had promised as a candidate, President Trump has moved to set the nation on a radically different course. Here is a look at his record to date.
2017-04-29.snippet: While his actions have produced few of the policy changes he had promised as a candidate, President Trump has moved to set the nation on a radically different course. Here is a look at his record to date.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump has presided over an extraordinary first 100 days in office marked by the aggressive use of executive power and a freewheeling leadership style, shattering the norms of the presidency and the traditions of Washington.
2017-04-29.headline_main: The Making of a Legacy: First Steps in the Trump Era

2017-04-29.abstract: In addition to getting players they hope can contribute immediately, the Giants picked up quarterback Davis Webb, who will be scrutinized as a potential successor to Eli Manning.
2017-04-29.snippet: In addition to getting players they hope can contribute immediately, the Giants picked up quarterback Davis Webb, who will be scrutinized as a potential successor to Eli Manning.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: The Giants believe they used the N.F.L. draft to address their overriding long-term issue — identifying a potential replacement for their franchise quarterback, Eli Manning — while tending to immediate needs.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Giants Draft for the Present, and the Future

2017-04-29.abstract: Azam Ahmed, who is bureau chief for Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean, says the new spotlight on Mexico has helped reveal its contradictions.
2017-04-29.snippet: Azam Ahmed, who is bureau chief for Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean, says the new spotlight on Mexico has helped reveal its contradictions.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: Azam Ahmed had been walking for hours in the sweltering humidity of southern Mexico, hiding from the police the whole way, when he realized his long day was about to get longer.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Meet the Mexico Bureau Chief. (His Job Has Changed Since Trump.)

2017-04-29.abstract: Kyle Wiltjer averaged just over 10 3-point attempts in the D-League this season as he tries to develop at a position vital to Houston’s success.
2017-04-29.snippet: Kyle Wiltjer averaged just over 10 3-point attempts in the D-League this season as he tries to develop at a position vital to Houston’s success.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: MISSISSAUGA, Ontario — When Kyle Wiltjer interviewed with the Houston Rockets before last year’s N.B.A. draft, he came prepared. He knew all about Daryl Morey, the team’s general manager. He knew all about the Rockets’ belief in analytics. He knew all about their fondness for the 3-point line. Wiltjer, a 6-foot-10 forward with a willowy jump shot, was as personable as he was knowledgeable, or at least that was the way he came across.
2017-04-29.headline_main: 6-Foot-10 and a 3-Point Shooter. Just What the Rockets Want.

2017-04-29.abstract: The Republic stands, but it’s a long time until noon Jan. 20, 2021.
2017-04-29.snippet: The Republic stands, but it’s a long time until noon Jan. 20, 2021.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: Here are a dozen things we have learned in President Trump’s first 100 days.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Lessons From 100 Days of President Trump

2017-04-29.abstract: I’m part of a system that makes students feel like criminals.
2017-04-29.snippet: I’m part of a system that makes students feel like criminals.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: BOSTON — Every morning, I stand behind the metal detectors, searching bags as students enter the school. They come clutching iced coffee and bags of chips, their faces burned by the wind. Sometimes they raise a hand in greeting, but mostly they look off into the distance, bobbing their heads to the music in their earbuds. I am an administrator at a public high school in Boston, serving almost entirely low-income black and Latino students, and that means every morning I am the white guy at the metal detector telling them they are suspected of a crime as they walk into their school.
2017-04-29.headline_main: The Man Behind the Metal Detector

2017-04-29.abstract: From preventing strokes to killing pigs, this drug does it all.
2017-04-29.snippet: From preventing strokes to killing pigs, this drug does it all.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — They say everything is bigger in Texas. And certainly, the saying holds true for the state’s feral hog population.
2017-04-29.headline_main: A Plan to Poison the Wild Hogs of Texas

2017-04-29.abstract: Why France’s populist tribune is different from Donald Trump.
2017-04-29.snippet: Why France’s populist tribune is different from Donald Trump.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: EVERY surge of right-wing populism confronts voters with a different dilemma. In the Brexit referendum, the risk was the policy, not the politicians. Voting to leave the European Union was not a vote to make Nigel Farage prime minister; it was a vote for a leap into the unknown, but one supervised by mainstream Tory leaders.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Is There a Case for Le Pen?

2017-04-29.abstract: Odds are against success this time around.
2017-04-29.snippet: Odds are against success this time around.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: With President Trump now talking about overhauling the tax code, it’s worth reflecting on the last time Congress revamped the system: the Tax Reform Act of 1986.
2017-04-29.headline_main: When Congress Made Taxes Fairer

2017-04-29.abstract: Mr. Trump served up red meat to conventioneers, feeding the fear that sustains the gun lobby.
2017-04-29.snippet: Mr. Trump served up red meat to conventioneers, feeding the fear that sustains the gun lobby.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: President Trump eagerly repaid his campaign debt to the National Rifle Association on Friday by appearing at its annual convention in Atlanta. Last year, candidate Trump benefited greatly from the N.R.A.’s endorsement and $30 million worth of campaign support; the N.R.A., in turn, relished Mr. Trump’s fear-inducing agenda, which led to greater arms sales among more and more ordinary Americans.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Even as President, Donald Trump Panders to the N.R.A.

2017-04-29.abstract: In the world’s biggest office, he has modeled a whole new smallness.
2017-04-29.snippet: In the world’s biggest office, he has modeled a whole new smallness.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: One hundred days, too many of them filled with needless drama and gratuitous insult, and still I remember the first full one. Still it makes me cringe.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Donald Trump’s One Awful Accomplishment

2017-04-29.abstract: Liberals are discovering what conservatives have known for years: Negative energy is a powerful force.
2017-04-29.snippet: Liberals are discovering what conservatives have known for years: Negative energy is a powerful force.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: MARIETTA, Ga. — Shortly before President Trump’s swearing-in, I spoke to Steve Cohen, a liberal congressman from Tennessee, about his decision to skip the ceremony. Mr. Cohen said his horror of Mr. Trump almost made him understand how Tea Partyers might have felt under President Barack Obama. “I want my country back!” he said, echoing the right’s rallying cry.
2017-04-29.headline_main: How the Left Learned to Hate Like the Right

2017-04-29.abstract: The agency’s new chief wants to gut the net neutrality rules that keep powerful broadband companies in check.
2017-04-29.snippet: The agency’s new chief wants to gut the net neutrality rules that keep powerful broadband companies in check.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: Here we go again. The Federal Communications Commission, now led by an anti-regulation ideologue appointed by President Trump, wants to gut the net neutrality rules that keep powerful broadband companies from calling the shots on the internet, at the expense of consumers.
2017-04-29.headline_main: F.C.C. Invokes Internet Freedom While Trying to Kill It

2017-04-29.abstract: It’s only been 100 days. Give him time, they say.
2017-04-29.snippet: It’s only been 100 days. Give him time, they say.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH — Al Paslow and Joe Peterson, friends since high school, together surfed the real estate and energy bubbles that buoyed the American economy — and together endured losing their lucrative jobs when each bubble burst.
2017-04-29.headline_main: These Guys Really Like Trump

2017-04-29.abstract: Protective immigration status is about to end for those who fled a nation still ravaged by natural disasters.
2017-04-29.snippet: Protective immigration status is about to end for those who fled a nation still ravaged by natural disasters.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of Haitians living in the United States are facing an ominous deadline. The temporary protected status that has allowed them to live and work here legally since 2010 — the year an earthquake devastated their country and left them unable to return safely home — is set to expire on July 22. Unless the homeland security secretary, John Kelly, decides to renew it, about 50,000 Haitians will lose their welcome here and be vulnerable to deportation.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Don’t Send 50,000 Back to Fragile Haiti

2017-04-29.abstract: “He doesn’t care what you think. I’m kind of that way, too, so I can respect that.”
2017-04-29.snippet: “He doesn’t care what you think. I’m kind of that way, too, so I can respect that.”
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: After the election, exit polls suggested that 53 percent of white women had voted for Donald Trump. I interviewed about a dozen white women who explained why they voted for him. At the 100-day mark, most pronounce themselves pleased and believe the country is moving in the right direction.
2017-04-29.headline_main: The Women Who Still Like Trump

2017-04-29.abstract: At least he writes his own tweets.
2017-04-29.snippet: At least he writes his own tweets.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: The establishment press has been vicious about Donald Trump. He’s portrayed, day after day, as a narcissist, personally obnoxious, with a policy agenda to match. He deserves most of this criticism.
2017-04-29.headline_main: The Upside to the Presidential Twitter Feed

2017-04-29.abstract: Everyone else is paying attention to other stuff.
2017-04-29.snippet: Everyone else is paying attention to other stuff.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: Here’s some good news for self-conscious people. That coffee stain on your shirt, those mismatched earrings you absent-mindedly selected this morning, that unfortunate haircut you just got — people do not notice those things as much as you think.
2017-04-29.headline_main: You’re Too Focused on What You’re Focused On

2017-04-29.abstract: My friends in Berkeley never want to head to the South. They’re making a mistake.
2017-04-29.snippet: My friends in Berkeley never want to head to the South. They’re making a mistake.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: BERKELEY, Calif. — My dad and stepmom live in Mobile, Ala., and spend their vacation time an hour’s drive away in Orange Beach, Ala. This means that, throughout my life, I have regularly vacationed there as well.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Expand Your World, Go to the Beach in Alabama

2017-04-29.abstract: American Communists had a noble cause, until they learned the truth.
2017-04-29.snippet: American Communists had a noble cause, until they learned the truth.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: At a rally in New York City in 1962, the famously liberal journalist Murray Kempton said to an audience full of old Reds: “I have known many Communists in my life. I have not known them as criminals. I knew them once as activists — and we had our quarrels. But while this country has not been kind to you, it has been fortunate in having you. You have been arrested, you have been followed, you have had your phones bugged, you have had your children fired. Throughout this, I can think of numbers of you I have known who have remained gallant and pleasant and unbroken.” He added, “I salute you and I hope for times to be better.”
2017-04-29.headline_main: When Communism Inspired Americans

2017-04-29.abstract: Thousands of Marines once flooded the Afghan province to push out the Taliban. Now 300 have returned there, and a difficult mission lies ahead.
2017-04-29.snippet: Thousands of Marines once flooded the Afghan province to push out the Taliban. Now 300 have returned there, and a difficult mission lies ahead.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: CAMP SHORAB, Afghanistan — Before the American flag was lowered, folded and retired and the last of the Marines left the Afghan province of Helmand in 2014, their commander offered some optimistic parting words.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Marines Return to Helmand Province for a Job They Thought Was Done

2017-04-29.abstract: On the president’s 100th day in office, demonstrators descended on Washington in an attempt to drown out the administration’s climate change deniers.
2017-04-29.snippet: On the president’s 100th day in office, demonstrators descended on Washington in an attempt to drown out the administration’s climate change deniers.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Tens of thousands of demonstrators, alarmed at what they see as a dangerous assault on the environment by the Trump administration, poured into the streets here on Saturday to sound warnings both planetary and political about the Earth’s warming climate.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Climate March Draws Thousands of Protesters Alarmed by Trump’s Environmental Agenda

2017-04-29.abstract: The pope, returning to Rome from a two-day trip to Egypt, says a nuclear conflict could be disastrous for “the future of humanity.”
2017-04-29.snippet: The pope, returning to Rome from a two-day trip to Egypt, says a nuclear conflict could be disastrous for “the future of humanity.”
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: ROME — Pope Francis urged the United States and North Korea on Saturday to defuse their increasingly tense standoff and avert a potentially horrific conflict.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Pope Francis Urges U.S. and North Korea to Step Away from the Brink

2017-04-29.abstract: Saturday’s dismissals were the latest chapter in a showdown over a news article published in October that has infuriated the powerful military.
2017-04-29.snippet: Saturday’s dismissals were the latest chapter in a showdown over a news article published in October that has infuriated the powerful military.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: ISLAMABAD, Pakistan — Under pressure from Pakistan’s military, Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif ousted two of his top officials on Saturday in a continuing standoff over leaks to the news media of a meeting at which civilian leaders confronted the military over its alleged reluctance to halt Islamist groups in the country.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Facing Military Pressure, Pakistan’s Prime Minister Ousts 2 Top Aides

2017-04-29.abstract: Judge, the Yankees’ rookie outfielder, blasted his tenth home run of the season as the Yankees continued their pattern of hitting the ball deep and often.
2017-04-29.snippet: Judge, the Yankees’ rookie outfielder, blasted his tenth home run of the season as the Yankees continued their pattern of hitting the ball deep and often.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: It was a day at Yankee Stadium when anything seemed possible.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Aaron Judge Leads the Renewed Bronx Bombers Past the Orioles

2017-04-29.abstract: An investigation by Delta found the pilot’s actions helped “de-escalate” the fight between passengers, in the latest airline episode to be recorded on video.
2017-04-29.snippet: An investigation by Delta found the pilot’s actions helped “de-escalate” the fight between passengers, in the latest airline episode to be recorded on video.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: In the latest airline episode captured on video, two women can be seen exchanging blows on a jet bridge at the Atlanta airport on April 21 when a Delta Air Lines pilot appears to grab one woman and smack her before stepping back.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Video Captures Delta Pilot Smacking Woman to Break Up Fight

2017-04-29.abstract: Michael Conforto hit two homers and Jose Reyes added one in the victory. Meanwhile, General Manager Sandy Alderson said the team needed to do a better job of minimizing injuries.
2017-04-29.snippet: Michael Conforto hit two homers and Jose Reyes added one in the victory. Meanwhile, General Manager Sandy Alderson said the team needed to do a better job of minimizing injuries.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — In his role as general manager of the Mets, Sandy Alderson has to worry about the big picture. So before Saturday’s game here, he laid out how the Mets must evaluate everything, from their players’ training regimens to how much water they are drinking, as the roster deals with a rash of early-season injuries, particularly to their best everyday player, outfielder Yoenis Cespedes.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Win Over Nationals Is Encouraging Sign for Debilitated Mets

2017-04-29.abstract: Alan Arbesfeld talks to us.
2017-04-29.snippet: Alan Arbesfeld talks to us.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: SUNDAY PUZZLE — The title of today’s puzzle gives away a lot of the theme of the puzzle, and what fascinated me about it was how our brains interpret that information. Your mileage may vary, of course, but it felt like today’s theme was narrated in my head by the actor William Daniels as he portrayed the Massachusetts native John Adams in the film “1776.”
2017-04-29.headline_main: New England Chatter

2017-04-29.abstract: Matt Walsh, who has portrayed the gaffe-prone White House press secretary on HBO, has some advice for Sean Spicer, the man who holds the job in real life.
2017-04-29.snippet: Matt Walsh, who has portrayed the gaffe-prone White House press secretary on HBO, has some advice for Sean Spicer, the man who holds the job in real life.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Mike McLintock, who has experience as the White House press secretary on the HBO show “Veep,” knows a thing or two about handling the White House press corps and is no stranger to foot-in-mouth moments.
2017-04-29.headline_main: What Mike McLintock From ‘Veep’ Would Say to Sean Spicer

2017-04-29.abstract: President Trump came into office fuming about China. But lately he has been describing his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, as if he were an old pal.
2017-04-29.snippet: President Trump came into office fuming about China. But lately he has been describing his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, as if he were an old pal.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: BEIJING — President Trump came into office fuming about China. But lately he has been describing his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, as if Mr. Xi were an old friend, even in dealing with deep divisions over North Korea.
2017-04-29.headline_main: A Spring Thaw? Trump Now Has ‘Very Good’ Words for China’s Leader

2017-04-29.abstract: The casualty was the third for the United States this past week in the fight against the Islamic State. Two soldiers were killed in Afghanistan on Wednesday.
2017-04-29.snippet: The casualty was the third for the United States this past week in the fight against the Islamic State. Two soldiers were killed in Afghanistan on Wednesday.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — An American service member was killed in an explosion on Saturday near Mosul, Iraq, the Pentagon said, as part of the battle to drive Islamic State fighters out of their last major stronghold in the country.
2017-04-29.headline_main: American Service Member Dies in Explosion Outside Mosul

2017-04-29.abstract: President Trump returned to the populist themes of his campaign with a Pennsylvania rally held in lieu of attending the White House Correspondents’ Association dinner.
2017-04-29.snippet: President Trump returned to the populist themes of his campaign with a Pennsylvania rally held in lieu of attending the White House Correspondents’ Association dinner.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: HARRISBURG, Pa. — President Trump came to a farm expo center here on Saturday to celebrate his first 100 days in office by bathing in the support of his bedrock supporters, reprising the populist themes of his campaign and savaging a familiar foe: the news media.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Trump Savages News Media at Rally to Mark His 100th Day

2017-04-29.abstract: Major cities in Vietnam, Thailand and Indonesia are forcing vendors to move, creating more space but diluting local flavor.
2017-04-29.snippet: Major cities in Vietnam, Thailand and Indonesia are forcing vendors to move, creating more space but diluting local flavor.
2017-04-29.lead_paragraph: HANOI, Vietnam — As strips of tofu sizzle beside her in a vat of oil, Nguyen Thu Hong listens for police sirens.
2017-04-29.headline_main: Efforts to Ease Congestion Threaten Street Food Culture in Southeast Asia

2017-04-30.abstract: Globalization silenced the historic looms of Calais; blue-collar voters there represent the forces powering the far right.
2017-04-30.snippet: Globalization silenced the historic looms of Calais; blue-collar voters there represent the forces powering the far right.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: CALAIS, France — The clang of giant weaving looms ricocheted across a cavernous factory one recent afternoon at Desseilles Laces, one of the oldest lace makers in France. A handful of workers flitted among the machines, guiding gossamer threads into a floral confection destined for luxury lingerie and couture dresses.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Once a Lace Capital, Now Riven by French Politics

2017-04-30.abstract: Jean-Gabriel Pageau erased Ottawa’s 5-3 deficit in the final four minutes of regulation and scored his fourth goal of the game in the second overtime.
2017-04-30.snippet: Jean-Gabriel Pageau erased Ottawa’s 5-3 deficit in the final four minutes of regulation and scored his fourth goal of the game in the second overtime.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — Rangers goaltender Henrik Lundqvist glided out for the second overtime and briefly paused, standing sideways in his crease. He had a tense task ahead.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Rangers Crumble at Hands of Senators’ One-Man Wrecking Crew

2017-04-30.abstract: Knowing that Devin Smith will miss the season with a knee injury, the Jets drafted another receiver on Saturday, as well as a tight end, a linebacker, a running back and two cornerbacks.
2017-04-30.snippet: Knowing that Devin Smith will miss the season with a knee injury, the Jets drafted another receiver on Saturday, as well as a tight end, a linebacker, a running back and two cornerbacks.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: FLORHAM PARK, N.J. — As the Jets entered this year’s N.F.L. draft, they sought an array of young players to rebuild a team that had missed the playoffs for six consecutive seasons and that had recently stripped its roster of expensive cornerstones like center Nick Mangold, wide receiver Brandon Marshall and cornerback Darrelle Revis.
2017-04-30.headline_main: With Key Pieces of Last Year’s Team Gone, Jets Begin Laying a New Foundation

2017-04-30.abstract: The comedian’s “Not The White House Correspondents’ Dinner” was both an alternative to the dinner itself, and to a rally in Pennsylvania that Trump held instead of attending the dinner.
2017-04-30.snippet: The comedian’s “Not The White House Correspondents’ Dinner” was both an alternative to the dinner itself, and to a rally in Pennsylvania that Trump held instead of attending the dinner.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Forget alternative facts — Samantha Bee is pioneering the alternative dinner. And even though luminaries from the media and Hollywood were on hand to schmooze and talk politics, it was “Not The White House Correspondents’ Dinner.”
2017-04-30.headline_main: At Samantha Bee’s ‘White House’ Dinner, Journalism Is Toasted as Trump Is Mocked

2017-04-30.abstract: The hacker or hackers, known as “thedarkoverlord,” demanded ransom after stealing 10 episodes of the next season of “Orange Is the New Black.”
2017-04-30.snippet: The hacker or hackers, known as “thedarkoverlord,” demanded ransom after stealing 10 episodes of the next season of “Orange Is the New Black.”
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: A hacker who claims to have stolen unreleased television shows from several major networks shared the coming season of the Netflix series “Orange Is the New Black” on Saturday after the person said the streaming service failed to meet its ransom requests.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Hacker Leaks Episodes From Netflix Show and Threatens Other Networks

2017-04-30.abstract: The judge’s ruling said that the system is unfair to the poor and that it violates the Constitution.
2017-04-30.snippet: The judge’s ruling said that the system is unfair to the poor and that it violates the Constitution.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Houston has overturned the county’s bail system for people charged with low-level crimes after finding that it disproportionately affected indigent residents and violated the Constitution.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Judge in Houston Strikes Down Harris County’s Bail System

2017-04-30.abstract: Corrections appearing in print on Sunday, April 20, 2017.
2017-04-30.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on Sunday, April 20, 2017.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: ARTS & LEISURE
2017-04-30.headline_main: Corrections: April 30, 2017

2017-04-30.abstract: Some observers say the Arsenal manager has seemed weary lately, leading to speculation that he may leave the position he has held for 21 seasons.
2017-04-30.snippet: Some observers say the Arsenal manager has seemed weary lately, leading to speculation that he may leave the position he has held for 21 seasons.

2017-04-30.snippet: With anti-authoritarian protests erupting across Eastern Europe, a pair of teenagers are among the young people taking action.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: BRATISLAVA, Slovakia — The pair of budding corruption fighters paused outside Slovakia’s presidential palace, trying to decide how long to give the government to capitulate to their demands. They wanted the resignations of the interior minister and the national police chief, as well as full and transparent investigations of a parade of recent corruption scandals. And that was just a start — the demonstration they had organized on Facebook was only a few hours away.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Young, Idealistic but Determined, Slovaks Lead Anticorruption Crusade

From the campaign through his first 100 days in office, President Trump adroitly exploited the most conspicuous downsides of trade in portraying himself as a hero to those who go to work in coveralls.

2017-04-30.abstract: Thomas Rainer’s work is a revelation: It turns out that plants are social, and have a body language that explains what they need.
2017-04-30.snippet: Thomas Rainer’s work is a revelation: It turns out that plants are social, and have a body language that explains what they need.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Thomas Rainer and I have both been doing the botanical thing for decades; we know, and use, many of the same plants — and even much of the same horticultural vocabulary. But what he and I see when we look at a butterfly weed or a coneflower, or what we mean when we say familiar words like “layering” or “ground cover,” is surprisingly not synonymous.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Understanding What Makes Plants Happy

2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Imagine opening an old shed by the side of the road and finding a 19th-century painting by a master artist. 2017-04-30.abstract: Gwendolyn Weiner, daughter of the collectors Ted and Lucile Weiner, donated Modigliani’s “Head” (circa 1913) to the museum in honor of her parents.
2017-04-30.snippet: Gwendolyn Weiner, daughter of the collectors Ted and Lucile Weiner, donated Modigliani’s “Head” (circa 1913) to the museum in honor of her parents.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: The Kimbell Art Museum in Fort Worth prides itself on its collection of works by modern masters like Picasso, Matisse and Mondrian. And now it can add Amedeo Modigliani, the Italian artist who died young and today fetches upward of $170 million at auctions, to its roster.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Kimbell Art Museum in Texas Acquires a Rare Modigliani Sculpture

2017-04-30.abstract: The administration is bracing for an avalanche of criticism after the president embraced Rodrigo Duterte, who has led a deadly crackdown on drugs in the Philippines.

2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — When President Trump called President Rodrigo Duterte of the Philippines on Saturday, White House officials saw it as part of a routine diplomatic outreach to Southeast Asian leaders. Mr. Trump, characteristically, had his own ideas.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Trump’s ‘Very Friendly’ Talk With Duterte Stuns Aides and Critics Alike

2017-04-30.snippet: An Oregon man who questioned the timing of a traffic light is fined $500 for engaging in the “practice of engineering” without a state-issued license.

2017-04-30.abstract: Apple’s shares are up nearly 60 percent since last summer. Investors hope new iPhones due in September will prompt many Apple users to upgrade.
2017-04-30.snippet: Apple’s shares are up nearly 60 percent since last summer. Investors hope new iPhones due in September will prompt many Apple users to upgrade.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — A year ago, many investors had given up on Apple, whose stock price had fallen more than 30 percent from its 2015 peak. Apple’s once-unstoppable growth had come to a crashing halt: The number of iPhones sold was down 13 percent, and the company posted its first revenue decline in 13 years.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Apple’s Stock Races Ahead as Investors Bet on New iPhones

2017-04-30.abstract: Mr. Steck was preparing to traverse some of the Himalayas’ highest peaks when he died in an accident, though the exact circumstances of the death were unknown.
2017-04-30.snippet: Mr. Steck was preparing to traverse some of the Himalayas’ highest peaks when he died in an accident, though the exact circumstances of the death were unknown.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: KATHMANDU, Nepal — Ueli Steck, a renowned mountain climber nicknamed “the Swiss Machine” for his rapid ascents of some of the world’s most imposing peaks, died in an accident on Sunday at a camp near Mount Everest, Nepali officials said.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Ueli Steck, Renowned Mountain Climber, Dies Near Everest at 40

2017-04-30.abstract: The reporter William Grimes talks about his onscreen appearance in “Obits,” a new documentary about a department reveling in newfound glamour.
2017-04-30.snippet: The reporter William Grimes talks about his onscreen appearance in “Obits,” a new documentary about a department reveling in newfound glamour.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: A few years ago, the New York Public Library played host to a panel discussion called “Dead From the NYPL: The Perverse Pleasures of Obituaries.” It drew an overflow, enthralled crowd, of which I was a member. As the evening wore on, it occurred to me for the first time that the writing of obituaries — my job at The Times since 2008 — might be a glamorous occupation with an enthusiastic fan base.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Lights, Camera, Obits!

2017-04-30.abstract: Leif Ove Andsnes and Marc-André Hamelin gave a commanding performance and received a long standing ovation.
2017-04-30.snippet: Leif Ove Andsnes and Marc-André Hamelin gave a commanding performance and received a long standing ovation.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Stravinsky’s “Rite of Spring” retains the power to shock in part through its raw, blazingly colorful orchestration. But the piece actually first came into being as a piano duo. Throughout his life, Stravinsky liked to sketch his pieces at the piano. So the piano version of the “Rite” is, in a way, the original.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Review: Stravinsky’s ‘Rite’ as a Piano Duo Captivates Carnegie Hall

2017-04-30.abstract: Amber Riley owns center stage without even seeming to try in Casey Nicholaw’s high-octane revival of this Supremes-inspired musical.
2017-04-30.snippet: Amber Riley owns center stage without even seeming to try in Casey Nicholaw’s high-octane revival of this Supremes-inspired musical.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: LONDON — When Effie White says that she’s nobody’s backup singer, it’s obvious she’s just speaking the simple truth. Never mind that when she makes this pronouncement, with a certainty that is as natural to her as breathing, it’s still early in Casey Nicholaw’s supercharged revival of “Dreamgirls,” a popular hit at the Savoy Theater here.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Review: A Souped-Up ‘Dreamgirls’ Roars in London

2017-04-30.abstract: The transportation hub serving about 650,000 daily passengers desperately needs an overhaul. So far, the New York governor’s plans don’t begin to address the problems.
2017-04-30.snippet: The transportation hub serving about 650,000 daily passengers desperately needs an overhaul. So far, the New York governor’s plans don’t begin to address the problems.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Almost every administration has a telltale moment. For Chris Christie, the New Jersey governor, it may well have come in 2010, before Bridgegate, when he stopped a plan to build new passenger rail tunnels under the Hudson River, connecting to Pennsylvania Station, claiming they cost New Jersey residents too dearly. In that one decision, he seemed to prove what critics would later say: He put shortsighted politics before constituents, and himself above public welfare.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Cuomo Has the Opportunity to Fix Penn Station, but Will He?

2017-04-30.abstract: The myriad challenges for Anne Pasternak, director of this institution, include remaining true to Brooklyn’s identity while embracing a shift in trends.
2017-04-30.snippet: The myriad challenges for Anne Pasternak, director of this institution, include remaining true to Brooklyn’s identity while embracing a shift in trends.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Brooklyn’s time may have come. But what of the Brooklyn Museum’s?
2017-04-30.headline_main: ‘Encyclopedic’ Brooklyn Museum Vies for Contemporary Attention

2017-04-30.abstract: For Cyrano — a challenging role even without foam prosthetics on your face — the tenor Roberto Alagna said he tried hard to focus his sound.
2017-04-30.snippet: For Cyrano — a challenging role even without foam prosthetics on your face — the tenor Roberto Alagna said he tried hard to focus his sound.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Filling the giant Metropolitan Opera House with ringing high notes and without microphones is hard. Doing it with a big piece of foam glued to the end of your nose is even tougher — especially if you don’t want your tone to conjure thoughts of clothespins or head colds.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Singing With, but Not Through, the Nose

2017-04-30.abstract: Mr. Bosco, who practices relentlessly, helped empower Brazilians living under dictatorship in the 1970s and early ’80s with songs of pride and fighting spirit.
2017-04-30.snippet: Mr. Bosco, who practices relentlessly, helped empower Brazilians living under dictatorship in the 1970s and early ’80s with songs of pride and fighting spirit.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Two centuries of his country’s rhythms flow through the fingers of João Bosco, one of Brazil’s most fabled guitarists, singers and composers. Now 70, he can stir up a whirlwind of speed and agility, breezing through tricky meters, harmonies and beats from all over Brazil.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Passion and Politics in João Bosco’s Brazilian Rhythms

2017-04-30.abstract: The stories of a group of company workers whose exposure to a seemingly magical luminescent paint became deadly.
2017-04-30.snippet: The stories of a group of company workers whose exposure to a seemingly magical luminescent paint became deadly.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: In the early 20th century, the United States Radium Corporation hired young women to paint the numbers and hands on watches so they could be seen in the dark. By the end of a day’s work, the women glowed, too. The seemingly magical substance in the paint that covered them — and gave them the name “shining girls” — was, of course, highly radioactive. The resulting tragic deaths led, eventually, to several of the women suing the company, in what would become a landmark workers’ rights case. In “The Radium Girls,” Kate Moore tells the story of these women, from their initial excitement about the work to their realization that it was killing them to their legal battles. Below, Ms. Moore tells us about the inspiration for the book, what surprised her most while researching it and more.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Tell Us 5 Things About Your Book: Kate Moore’s ‘The Radium Girls’

2017-04-30.abstract: A video shared by the city’s crown prince says that “expression knows no boundaries or limits,” but within the United Arab Emirates that is not the case.
2017-04-30.snippet: A video shared by the city’s crown prince says that “expression knows no boundaries or limits,” but within the United Arab Emirates that is not the case.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Dubai has long had a taste for the finer things in life. The influential Persian Gulf city has been home to the world’s tallest building, a hotel that offers guests private butlers and 24-karat-gold iPads, and even a bakery that sold gold-laced cupcakes for roughly $1,000 each.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Dubai Introduces Its Own Font, Lauding Free Expression It Does Not Permit

2017-04-30.abstract: Wiscasset, the former home of New York City’s correction commissioner, Joseph Ponte, was a frequent destination in his city-issued vehicle, investigators found.
2017-04-30.snippet: Wiscasset, the former home of New York City’s correction commissioner, Joseph Ponte, was a frequent destination in his city-issued vehicle, investigators found.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: WISCASSET, Me. — The trip, even in the best of conditions, is one that will eat up at least a quarter of a day. It starts with creeping through traffic heading out of New York City and soon gives way to a tour of New England. One route touches five states, skirting bigger cities and cutting through smaller ones, but mostly the journey is spent cruising along on six-lane highways, whipping past a blur of trees.
2017-04-30.headline_main: During Rikers Upheaval, the ‘Prettiest Village in Maine’ Beckoned

2017-04-30.abstract: Saeed Karimian, the owner of Gem TV, a network of television channels that broadcasts in Farsi and other languages, was ambushed as he drove through an upscale neighborhood.
2017-04-30.snippet: Saeed Karimian, the owner of Gem TV, a network of television channels that broadcasts in Farsi and other languages, was ambushed as he drove through an upscale neighborhood.

2017-04-30.abstract: The number of disillusioned voters who abstain could determine if the far-right candidate, Marine Le Pen, upends expectations in the presidential runoff.
2017-04-30.snippet: The number of disillusioned voters who abstain could determine if the far-right candidate, Marine Le Pen, upends expectations in the presidential runoff.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: STAINS, France — For voters in the poorer, largely immigrant suburbs of Paris, the motivation to turn out for France’s presidential runoff seems clear: to defeat Marine Le Pen, the far-right leader of the National Front, who has pitched her campaign against immigrants and Muslims.
2017-04-30.headline_main: In France’s Poor Suburbs, Angry Voters May Skip Big Election

2017-04-30.abstract: Over the years, the online giant has picked off different retail businesses, from books to electronics. Now apparel sellers are starting to succumb.
2017-04-30.snippet: Over the years, the online giant has picked off different retail businesses, from books to electronics. Now apparel sellers are starting to succumb.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — If future anthropologists want to study the rubble of early-21st-century retail, a good place to start will be what Amazon.com did to apparel shopping in the few years before and after 2017.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Amid Brick-and-Mortar Travails, a Tipping Point for Amazon in Apparel

2017-04-30.abstract: Amazon recently received an intriguing patent for an “on demand” apparel manufacturing system, which can quickly fill online orders for suits, dresses and other garments.
2017-04-30.snippet: Amazon recently received an intriguing patent for an “on demand” apparel manufacturing system, which can quickly fill online orders for suits, dresses and other garments.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: The process starts when customers submit online orders to the retailer for shirts and other articles of clothing, accessories, bedding, curtains and towels. The patterns,  printed onto rolls of fabric or other material, are arranged to reduce scrap.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Detailing Amazon’s Custom-Clothing Patent

2017-04-30.abstract: The Hollywood cool factor of the Obama years was all but gone, but people came out to celebrate the press and the weekend’s other hero, Samantha Bee.
2017-04-30.snippet: The Hollywood cool factor of the Obama years was all but gone, but people came out to celebrate the press and the weekend’s other hero, Samantha Bee.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — It was not so long ago — was it really just last year? — that the three-day, Hollywood-fueled party apparatus surrounding the White House Correspondents’ Association dinner was nearly as talked about as the dinner itself, if only for the odd-couple-style mingling of journalists, celebrities and elected officials, and for the reliable complaints that the whole thing was much too cozy for comfort.
2017-04-30.headline_main: As Trump Assails the Media, Washington Finds the Will to Party

2017-04-30.abstract: Mr. Contino, the inspiration for a notable novella, had been a sensation until changing times and resentment over draft evasion hurt his career.
2017-04-30.snippet: Mr. Contino, the inspiration for a notable novella, had been a sensation until changing times and resentment over draft evasion hurt his career.
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Dick Contino, whose energetic accordion playing and movie-star looks made him a teenage star in the late 1940s, but whose celebrity ebbed after he was imprisoned for evading induction into the draft, died on April 19 in Fresno, Calif. He was 87.
2017-04-30.headline_main: Dick Contino, Accordion Heartthrob, Dies at 87

2017-04-30.abstract: After the Rangers blew a late two-goal lead in Game 2 against the Senators, Coach Alain Vigneault says, “Minutes are based on how you’re playing, not experience.”
2017-04-30.snippet: After the Rangers blew a late two-goal lead in Game 2 against the Senators, Coach Alain Vigneault says, “Minutes are based on how you’re playing, not experience.”
2017-04-30.lead_paragraph: Why didn’t defenseman Brendan Smith see more ice time in the third period? Why wasn’t the checking line out there in overtime? Why, oh why, do the Rangers keep throwing away almost certain victories in the final minutes of playoff games?
2017-04-30.headline_main: Trying to Prevent a Third Loss, Rangers Embrace Second-Guessing
